channel.title: Tutorials on SoDa
channel.description: Recent content in Tutorials on SoDa

item.title: Reproducible science using Statistics Netherlands microdata
item.description: Through ODISSEI, researchers can get access to microdata of the Dutch national statistical agency Statistics Netherlands (CBS).

item.title: ArtScraper: A Python library to scrape online artworks
item.description: ArtScraper is a Python library to download images and metadata for artworks available on WikiArt and Google Arts & Culture.

item.title: How to share your research code
item.description: With the increasing popularity of open science practices, it is now more and more common to openly share code along with more traditional scientific objects such as papers.
